trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound"></xref> events.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when `DataBind` is called on the item during a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> object as the source of the event.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> that is the source of the event.
Gets the node item that is the source of the event.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> that is the source of the event.
